categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic platoons

nodes.text: This platoon was under the command of Sergeant Hork during the Galactic Civil War. The unit had a tradition where all new members had to grow beards or braids, and could only remove them when they were told to. Despite this, many of the members of the platoon chose to keep their beards. The platoon was assigned to an operation to take an Imperial strongpoint, which they managed to do with light casualties.
